title: Measurement Status
description: Lifecycle status of a media buy within a measurement agent

enumDescriptions.pending_data: Registered but waiting for sufficient exposure data
enumDescriptions.modeling: Data received, model is training or processing
enumDescriptions.reporting: Results are available and being updated on cadence
enumDescriptions.completed: Measurement is complete (flight ended, final results available)
enumDescriptions.paused: Measurement is paused (e.g., flight paused, data feed interrupted)
